QuestData.Title: The Rook's Guard
QuestData.Description: Black Rook Hold is not the same place I knew. Its walls have crumbled, a ghostly echo of its former glory.$B$BIf Lord Ravencrest has returned, then surely he will have his former officers at his side.$B$BKester Farseeker, captain of the guard.$B$BTrelan Shieldbreaker, peerless master of maces.$B$BStarlys Strongbow, who could split arrows while blindfolded.$B$BIf we stand any chance of entering the tower itself, they must be eliminated.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Kester Farseeker, Trelan Shieldbreaker, and Starlys Strongbow.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. May their spirits be at peace.
